items.sentence: We're not allowed to tell Tom what's going on.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all watching TV.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all very hungry.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all on vacation.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all looked relieved.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all look ridiculous.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all knew what to do.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all got up to leave.
Tom wouldn't tell the police officer his name.
Tom wouldn't tell Mary what his last name was.
Tom would never be able to do that by himself.
Tom won't tell Mary why he's going to do that.
Tom won't be able to do everything by himself.
Tom won't be able to come over this afternoon.
Tom will take care of the baby this afternoon.
Tom will probably be happy to do that for you.
Tom will be driving to Boston on October 20th.
Tom went over to Mary's to give her something.
Tom went over to Mary's house to ask for help.
Tom wasn't ready for what was going to happen.
